thread.title: 4 Fed rate hikes this year would be 'gradual': Dudley

title: 4 Fed rate hikes this year would be 'gradual': Dudley

organizations.name: mins ago ashlee espinal | reuters william c. dudley
federal reserve bank of new york  four

text:
GDP outlook 4 Fed rate hikes this year would be 'gradual': Dudley New York Federal Reserve President William Dudley said that the interest-rate rises by the Fed this year would be gradual. Recent fiscal stimulus and signs of inflation have convinced some investors that four hikes are likely this year. Published 2 Hours Ago Ashlee Espinal | Reuters William C. Dudley, President of the Federal Reserve Bank of New York 
Four interest-rate rises by the Federal Reserve this year would constitute a "gradual" tightening, New York Fed President William Dudley said on Thursday, offering his definition of what has become a policy mantra from U.S. central bankers. 
"If you were to go to four, 25-basis-point rate hikes I think it would still be gradual," the influential official said at a Sao Paulo conference, noting that would be half as aggressive a policy tightening as the Fed conducted last decade. 
Fed forecasts from December point to three expected hikes this year, though recent fiscal stimulus and signs of inflation have convinced some investors that four is more likely. Dudley added that U.S. fiscal policy is turning "quite stimulative."
